channel.title: CVE Feed for Brave -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Brave -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-35655|2024-06-12T09:19:48.144Z -- brave -- brave%20popup%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Brave Brave Popup Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Brave Popup Builder: from n/a through 0.6.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-35655|2024-06-05T05:15:36.603Z -- brave -- brave%20popup%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Brave Brave Popup Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Brave Popup Builder: from n/a through 0.6.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-30453|2024-03-29T16:38:15.281Z -- brave -- brave%20popup%20builder
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Brave Brave Popup Builder.This issue affects Brave Popup Builder: from n/a through 0.6.5.

item.title: CVE-2023-51534|2024-02-01T10:31:20.665Z -- brave -- brave%20%E2%80%93%20create%20popup%2C%20optins%2C%20lead%20generation%2C%20survey%2C%20sticky%20elements%20%26%20interactive%20content
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Brave Brave – Create Popup, Optins, Lead Generation, Survey, Sticky Elements & Interactive Content allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Brave – Create Popup, Optins, Lead Generation, Survey, Sticky Elements & Interactive Content: from n/a through 0.6.2.
